data.key_file: Path to your Google Cloud service account json file

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: `{key_file}` is no longer valid. Fix the path or recreate it.

error.file_not_found: The specidied key file does not exist. Fix the path and try again.

data.voice: Default voice name (overrides language and gender)
data.gain: Default volume gain (in dB) of the voice
